LandingPage.hero-title: The best baths for your comfort and relaxation
LandingPage.hero-description: Discover the atmosphere of traditional saunas with natural materials and luxurious amenities.
LandingPage.about-description: A sauna is not just a place to relax but also to regain strength. Our saunas made of natural materials will give you true pleasure.
LandingPage.service-card-1-description: Create a unique sauna tailored to your preferences and needs.
LandingPage.service-card-2-description: Choose from our catalog of ready-made sauna projects for your site.
LandingPage.service-card-3-description: We will help you choose the optimal project and material for your sauna.

Policy.privacy-privacy-policy-intro: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, protect, and disclose your personal information when using our website.
Policy.privacy-section-1-content-1: Name and contact information (e.g., email address)
Policy.privacy-section-1-content-3: Site usage history (e.g., pages you visited)
Policy.privacy-section-2-content-2: Sending notifications about new offers, promotions, or updates
Policy.privacy-section-2-content-3: Responding to your inquiries or complaints
Policy.privacy-section-3-content: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information. However, no data transmission system over the Internet or data storage system can be 100% secure.
Policy.privacy-section-4-content: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
Policy.privacy-section-5-content: Our website uses cookies to enhance the user experience. Cookies help us remember your preferences and improve user experience.
Policy.privacy-section-6-content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with the date of the last update.

Footer.footer-bottom-text: Â© 2024 Custom Saunas. All rights reserved.
